mapper.insert: insert into receive(re_code, item_code, customer_code, re_date, employee_id, re_qty,item_name) select concat('REC', replace(current_date(), '-', ''), nullif(max(rec_id)+1, 1)),#{item_code}, #{customer_code},#{re_date},#{employee_id},#{re_qty},#{item_name} from receive
mapper.select:
select * from receive where 1=1
AND item_code AND customer_code
LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
order by re_date desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
